title: Meal Prep Planner
subtitle: Plan your weekly meal prep with AI-powered calculations
apiKeyDescription: Enter your OpenAI API key to enable AI-powered ingredient calculations and meal prep instructions. Your key is stored locally and never sent to our servers.

setup.title: Setup Your Meal Prep
setup.description: Set the cooking day, date range, and number of people
setup.cookingDateHint: The day you'll prepare all meals
setup.mealsPerDayHint: Main meals to prep each day (lunch, dinner)
setup.summaryText: You're planning meals for {days} days, serving {people} people per meal.
setup.dietaryRestrictionsHint: Select any dietary restrictions to filter meal suggestions

templates.title: Templates
templates.noTemplates: No saved templates. Save a meal prep plan as a template to reuse it later.

meals.title: Select Your Meals
meals.description: Choose meals to prep from your saved recipes or add custom ones
meals.noSavedMeals: No saved meals found. Add a custom meal or save some meals first.
meals.customPlaceholder: Enter meal name (e.g., Chicken Stir Fry)
meals.aiWillGenerate: AI will generate ingredients and instructions for custom meals

components.title: Build Your Meals
components.description: Select proteins, sides, and vegetables to create your meal combinations
components.modeDescription: Build meals from individual components (protein + side + vegetable)
components.combinationDescription: AI will suggest how to combine your components for each day
components.noComponents: Add at least one component from each category to start

calculating.title: Calculating Your Meal Prep
calculating.description: AI is calculating ingredients, instructions, and storage guidance...

prep.title: Prep Guide
prep.description: Follow this guide on cooking day for maximum efficiency
prep.orderDescription: Follow this order for the most efficient meal prep session:
prep.label: Label
prep.noScheduleData: No smart schedule data available. Try recalculating.

timer.title: Timer Mode
timer.description: Interactive cooking session with step-by-step guidance

portions.title: Portion Tracking
portions.expiringWarning: {count} container(s) expiring today! Use them soon.

errors.noApiKey: Please add your OpenAI API key to use AI features
errors.calculationFailed: Failed to calculate meal prep. Please try again.
errors.saveFailed: Failed to save meal prep plan
errors.addToGroceryFailed: Failed to add ingredients to grocery list
errors.templateNameRequired: Please enter a plan name before saving as template
